main event: An unidentified flying object was observed moving in the sky in Shreveport, La.
interesting points: The object was described as oval-shaped and had vapor trails resembling exhaust., The witness observed the object for approximately 15 minutes., There was no determination of the object's size, speed, or altitude., The report is part of the Project Blue Book investigations into UFO sightings., The sighting was mentioned in the context of a larger investigation into unidentified phenomena.
sighted object: an oval-shaped object with vapor trails
